name: Part 1
func:
let input = msg.payload

let tot = input.replaceAll("A X", "4")
        .replaceAll("A Y", "8")
        .replaceAll("A Z", "3")
        .replaceAll("B X", "1")
        .replaceAll("B Y", "5") 
        .replaceAll("B Z", "9")
        .replaceAll("C X", "7")
        .replaceAll("C Y", "2")
        .replaceAll("C Z", "6")
        .split("\n").map(Number).reduce((a,b) => a+b)

msg.payload = "Part 1: " + tot

return msg;

name: Part 2
func:
let input = msg.payload

let tot = input.replaceAll("A X", "3")
        .replaceAll("A Y", "4")
        .replaceAll("A Z", "8")
        .replaceAll("B X", "1")
        .replaceAll("B Y", "5")
        .replaceAll("B Z", "9")
        .replaceAll("C X", "2")
        .replaceAll("C Y", "6")
        .replaceAll("C Z", "7")
        .split("\n").map(Number).reduce((a,b) => a+b)
    
msg.payload = "Part 2: " + tot

return msg;

name: Welcome
info:
In order to use your own input, simply change 
the cookie in the "http request" node headers to your own!
